summary: A masked, shadowy killer brutally murders the models of a scandalous fashion house in Rome.
cast: Cameron Mitchell|Eva Bartok|Thomas Reiner|Arianna Gorini|Dante DiPaolo|Mary Arden|Franco Ressel|Claude Dantes|Luciano Pigozzi|Lea Lander|Massimo Righi|Francesca Ungaro|Giuliano Raffaelli|Harriet Medin|Mary Carmen|Heidi Stroh|Enzo Cerusico|Nadia Anty|Calisto Calisti|Paul Frees|Goffredo Unger
keywords: giallo|psycho sexual|multiple homicide|pair of killers|betrayed by boyfriend
title: Seis mujeres para el asesino
